inner_vlan.name: inner_vlan
inner_vlan.description: The inner vlan tag to check the availability of on the node/interface combination.
inner_vlan.validation_error_text: Parameter inner_vlan only accepts integer numbers.

workgroup_id.name: workgroup_id
workgroup_id.description: The workgroup ID that the user wants to check if vlan_tag is available.
workgroup_id.validation_error_text: Parameter workgroup_id only accepts integer numbers.

interface.name: interface
interface.description: The name of the interface to check the vlan tags availability.
interface.validation_error_text: Parameter interface only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

node.name: node
node.description: The name of the node the interface is on.
node.validation_error_text: Parameter node only accepts printable characters and spaces, including newlines. This excludes control characters.

vlan.name: vlan
vlan.description: The vlan tag to check the availability of on the node/interface combination.
vlan.validation_error_text: Parameter vlan only accepts integer numbers.

name: is_vlan_tag_available
description: returns the availability of the vlan tag for a given node and interface
